subNode:value.scalar:string: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails.
Are you sure you want to delete all settings and your logs?

log_email ( `id_log_email` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `id_email_type` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `id_cart_rule` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `id_customer` INT UNSIGNED NULL , `id_cart` INT UNSIGNED NULL , `date_add` DATETIME NOT NULL, INDEX `date_add`(`date_add`), INDEX `id_cart`(`id_cart`) ) ENGINE=
Four kinds of e-mail alerts available in order to stay in touch with your customers!
Define settings and place this URL in crontab or call it manually daily:
For each cancelled cart (with no order), generate a discount and send it to the customer.
</label> <div class="margin-form" style="padding-top: 5px;"><input type="checkbox" name="PS_FOLLOW_UP_ENABLE_1" value="1" style="vertical-align: middle;"
For each validated order, generate a discount and send it to the customer.
</label> <div class="margin-form" style="padding-top: 5px;"><input type="checkbox" name="PS_FOLLOW_UP_ENABLE_2" value="1" style="vertical-align: middle;"
For each customer raising a threshold, generate a discount and send it to the customer.
</label> <div class="margin-form" style="padding-top: 5px;"><input type="checkbox" name="PS_FOLLOW_UP_ENABLE_3" value="1" style="vertical-align: middle;"
For each customer who has already passed at least one order and with no orders since a given duration, generate a discount and send it to the customer.
</label> <div class="margin-form" style="padding-top: 5px;"><input type="checkbox" name="PS_FOLLOW_UP_ENABLE_4" value="1" style="vertical-align: middle;"
Delete outdated discounts during each launch to clean database.
U = Number of discounts used (valid orders only)
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.date_add, '%Y-%m-%d') date_stat, l.id_email_type, COUNT(l.id_log_email) nb, (SELECT COUNT(l2.id_cart_rule) FROM
order_cart_rule ocr ON (ocr.id_cart_rule = l2.id_cart_rule) LEFT JOIN
orders o ON (o.id_order = ocr.id_order) WHERE l2.id_email_type = l.id_email_type AND l2.date_add = l.date_add AND ocr.id_order IS NOT NULL AND o.valid = 1) nb_used FROM
log_email l WHERE l.date_add >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(l.date_add, '%Y-%m-%d'), l.id_email_type

scalar:array.comment: /* Each cart which wasn't transformed into an order */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT c.id_cart, c.id_lang, cu.id_customer, cu.firstname, cu.lastname, cu.email FROM
orders o ON (o.id_cart = c.id_cart) RIGHT JOIN
customer cu ON (cu.id_customer = c.id_customer) RIGHT JOIN
cart_product cp ON (cp.id_cart = c.id_cart) WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= c.date_add AND o.id_order IS NULL
log_email WHERE id_email_type <> 4 OR date_add >= DATE_SUB(date_add,INTERVAL

scalar:array.comment: /* For all validated orders, a discount if re-ordering before x days */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT o.id_order, c.id_cart, o.id_lang, cu.id_customer, cu.firstname, cu.lastname, cu.email FROM
customer cu ON (cu.id_customer = o.id_customer) LEFT JOIN
cart c ON (c.id_cart = o.id_cart) WHERE o.valid = 1 AND c.date_add >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cu.is_guest = 0

scalar:array.comment: /* For all customers with more than x euros in 90 days */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT SUM(o.total_paid) total, c.id_cart, o.id_lang, cu.id_customer, cu.firstname, cu.lastname, cu.email FROM
customer cu ON (cu.id_customer = o.id_customer) LEFT JOIN
cart c ON (c.id_cart = o.id_cart) WHERE o.valid = 1 AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 90 DAY) <= o.date_add AND cu.is_guest = 0
You are one of our best customers!
You are one of our best customers

scalar:array.comment: /* For all customers with no orders since more than x days */

/** * badCustomer send mails to all customers with no orders since more than x days, * with at least one valid order in history * * @param boolean $count if set to true, will return number of customer (default : false, will send mails, no return value) * @return void */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT o.id_lang, c.id_cart, cu.id_customer, cu.firstname, cu.lastname, cu.email, (SELECT COUNT(o.id_order) FROM
orders o WHERE o.id_customer = cu.id_customer and o.valid = 1) nb_orders FROM
orders o ON (o.id_customer = cu.id_customer) LEFT JOIN
cart c ON (c.id_cart = o.id_cart) WHERE cu.id_customer NOT IN (SELECT o.id_customer FROM

scalar:array.comment: //when this is call by cron context is not init
//when this is call by cron context is not init
/* Clean-up database by deleting all outdated discounts */

subNode:value.scalar:string: cart_rule WHERE date_to < NOW() AND code LIKE "FLW-%"
